head.title: Java Redaction API | Hide sensitive data from PDF Word Excel Image
head.description: Java document redaction API â€“ Hide personal data from PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint presentations & raster images through various redaction types.

header.title: Redact Private Information via Java API
header.description: Exclude or hide personal information & metadata from documents, worksheets, presentations, PDF and raster image files using Java redaction API.

tabs.overview: GroupDocs.Redaction for Java API lets developers remove sensitive data from popular file formats like Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF and images so it can be used and distributed, but still protect confidential information too. The redaction library offers a single format-independent interface to redact any type of classified information including social security numbers, medical information, financial, proprietary, legal or even trade details through text, metadata and annotation redaction types. It allows you to save the document in its original format and create a sanitized PDF document with raster images of original pages.

one.description: Following is an overview of GroupDocs.Redaction for {{ProductName}}:

content.title: Redact Text, Metadata & Comments
content.step_1: **Word**: DOC, DOCX, DOT, ODT, DOTX, DOCM, DOTM, RTF
content.step_2: **Excel**: XLS, XLSX, XLT, XLTX, XLSM, XLTM, CSV
content.step_3: **PowerPoint**: PPT, PPTX, PPS, PPSX, POTX, PPTM, PPSM, POTM
content.step_5: **Raster Images**: JPG, BMP, PNG, GIF, TIFF

three.description: GroupDocs.Redaction for {{ProductName}} supports following Operating Systems, Frameworks & Package Managers:

row1.title: Operating Systems
row1.data:
* Microsoft Windows Desktop
                * Microsoft Windows Server
                * Linux
                * MacOS

features.title: GroupDocs.Redaction for {{ProductName}} Features
features.feature1: Search and redact exact matches of a search string
features.feature2: Control the redaction process and skip specific matches
features.feature3: Locate and redact using regular expressions
features.feature4: Built-in support for office formats and PDF
features.feature5: Wipe out metadata or redact metadata values
features.feature6: Limit redactions to specific worksheets and columns
features.feature7: Remove annotations or redact their texts
features.feature8: Use textual (exemption codes) or graphic (colored rectangles) redactions
features.feature9: Save the document in its original format or as a PDF with raster images of original pages
features.feature10: Support for raster image formats and image region redactions
features.feature11: Integration interface for implementing custom redaction and formats
features.feature12: Edit or Remove EXIF Metadata from Image Files
features.feature13: Redact Embedded Images inside the PDF, Word & Presentation Documents

more_features.title: Ensure Privacy by Redacting your Classified Data
more_features.content: {{ProductFullName}} library empowers developers to redact text and images from supported documents by employing a variety of redaction types. To use our Redaction API is simple and straight forward.

example.description: The following code example uses a tabular document such as Microsoft Excel spreadsheet where the scope of redaction can be limited to a specific worksheet and/or column. It uses filters to redact the second column with emails on a worksheet "Customers", leaving all other emails untouched in the document.
example.comment_init: Create an instance of Redactor class

solutions: GroupDocs.Redaction offers document viewing APIs for other popular development environments
